data.eml:eml: Nine new species of Castiarina Gory & Laporte, 1838 (Coleoptera: Buprestidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Barker, Shelley (2005): Nine new species of Castiarina Gory & Laporte, 1838 (Coleoptera: Buprestidae). Zootaxa 1062: 57-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.273278
